name: redQuo.com
overview:
redQuo.com is based in San Diego, California and currently under Open Beta. We believe in providing reliable, efficient and direct user and agent connection. We provide you an easy way to find insurance quotes by connecting you directly with agents and provide you other remarkable features to make your insurance quote searching experience fun and easy, all for free.

Finally, an insurance quote site which is hassle free, user friendly and good looking!

Behind the Idea: On a Sunday afternoon while working on calling some leads from a lead generating website, Anil was frustrated as none of the leads were responding. That night after dinner, Anil started discussing about the loopholes in the insurace quote and lead generating websites to Anubhav. The consumers needed a website that could provide a platform to users to connect directly with the agents and for the agents to get direct user interest, this is when Anubhav decided to step in and create redQuo.com.
